transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Haan ji. Hello. Ji Arshad sir, good good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Haan. Kya hua sir? Sahi hua aapka wo channel?
Customer: Haan, abhi chal raha hai sir.
Executive: Theek theek. To lead vagaira use kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Haan, maine do lead abhi abhi consume ki.
Executive: Ji ji. To sir yahi thoda sa follow up lena tha ki matlab lead kaisi aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Lead sahi aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Abhi to aa rahi hai, ab main check karunga na ek do din ke baad aapko update de dunga sir.
Executive: Theek theek. Okay okay sir. Okay ek do din ke baad aapko update. Okay okay.
Customer: [inaudible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive asking about the leads.



Resolution:

- Customer said he will check and update.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide an update in 1-2 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, follow up, update
